doc.field: The Art Department files contain materials produced while planning and creating issues of Fortune. All the materials were used to create issues of Fortune in 1982 but supplemental materials are included. The supplemental materials were used as references and may be from an earlier period than the magazine issue that was being produced. Included in this series are picture and caption layouts, magazine page mockups, correspondence about issues encountered while planning page layouts, handwritten notes, press kits, industry reports, press releases, photographs, slides, photo proofs, pamphlets, lists of reference, lists of assignments, article drafts, lists of event attendees, clippings, editorial schedules, and lists of acknowledgments.
